body:
Release Notes

Network360 Team

The Network360 Team is pleased to release some bug fixes in this sprint.
Fixes
Accessibility
  • Fixed a sorting issue on the Manage Accessibility Analyses Page’s Name column. Now, the column can be sorted in either descending or ascending order.
Adequacy
  • Fixed a sorting issue on the Manage Adequacy Analyses Page’s Name column. Now, the column can be sorted in either descending or ascending order.
Specifications
  • Fixed a sorting issue on the Manage Specifications Page’s Name column. Now, the column can be sorted in either descending or ascending order.
  • Now, when the user adds a standard, the user can easily see the validation message for the required specialty instead of seeing an incorrect validation message for the minimum provider ratio.
